de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class DependentGuiObjectCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DependentGuiObjectCV
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DependentBorderCV, DependentLineObjectToObjectCV, DependentLineObjectToPointCV

    public abstract class DependentGuiObjectCV
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to specify objects that can be displayed on the screen such that their visual display depends on other objects that are of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. This means that an object of class DependentGuiObjectCV cannot be animated on its own but only in relation to the object(s) it depends on. To specify dependencies, an object of class DependentGuiObjectCV can be registered with one or more objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. In an animation, the draw() method of the AnimatedGuiObjectCV object will then call automatically the draw() method of the registered DependentGuiObjectCV object.
    A typical example is a line connecting two objects. Here, the endpoints of the line have to be modified in accordance with the actual positions of the objects (see subclasses LineBetweenObjects and LineBetweenObjectAndPoint).
    NB: Does currently not work fully for all types of objects, e.g. not fully for rotatable drawable.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public abstract void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Method to draw the object - to be implemented in subclasses. This method will be called automatically by the draw() methods of objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV where this object is registered.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to draw on

      • deregister

        public abstract void deregister()
        Method to deregister the object from all AnimatedGuiObjectCV objects where it is currently registered.

      • onDeregisteredFromGuiObject

        public abstract void onDeregisteredFromGuiObject(AnimatedGuiObjectCV guiobj)
        Method called from the removeDependentGuiObject() of an object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV. Can e.g. be used to deregister this DependentGuiObjectCV object from other AnimatedGuiObjectCV objects.
        Parameters:
        guiobj - The object from where this method is called.
